scripts.build:all: npm run build:src && npm run build:serverextension
scripts.build:serverextension: cd jupyterlab && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.clean: rimraf docs && rimraf lib && rimraf test/build && rimraf test/coverage
scripts.clean:all: npm run clean && cd jupyterlab && npm run clean && cd ..
scripts.clean:slate: npm run clean:all && npm run clean:examples && rimraf jupyterlab/node_modules && rimraf node_modules && npm install && cd jupyterlab && npm install && cd ..
scripts.docs: typedoc --mode modules --module commonjs --excludeNotExported --target es5 --moduleResolution node --out docs/ src
scripts.test:chrome: npm run build:test && karma start --browsers=Chrome test/karma.conf.js
scripts.test:coverage: npm run build:test && webpack --config test/webpack-cov.conf.js && karma start test/karma-cov.conf.js
scripts.test:debug: npm run build:test && karma start --browsers=Chrome --singleRun=false --debug=true test/karma.conf.js
scripts.test:firefox: npm run build:test && karma start --browsers=Firefox test/karma.conf.js
scripts.test:ie: npm run build:test && karma start --browsers=IE test/karma.conf.js
scripts.watch:test: watch "npm run build && npm test" src test/src --wait 10
